    Megatron had n otime to deal with Terrorsaur. "Follow us or stay, it is 
up to you, but we are leaveing!" He said and plowed past the dinosaur and 
continued further down the hallway. The Maximals quickly followed.

    Rampage lumbered down the hall way seeking Megatron. He lived in this 
ship alone for months, he was going to find that over grown lizard. He turned 
the corner, and there he saw Megatron and the Maximals. The last thing he 
remembered was a bright blue plasma pulse shooting towrds his face.

    "Excellent! The hatch is this way! You three go to these coordinates, I 
have business to attend to." Megatron commanded giving them a map to the 
cave. When they left he went to the bridge. Inside he found Aracnia waiting 
for him, along with several of her new minions.
    "Too bad Aracnia.....this could have been a new era for Predacons. You 
had to ruin it!" he yelled just before they began to open fire on him. It was 
no matter, he threw a charge in the room and bolted down the hatch. In the 
distance he could see his new troops running to the cave. And soon he would 
be there as well.

    Aracnia cursed through the smoke, and then said, "Raise shields, initiate 
Autoguns, and seal all doors!" Then she took the command chair. From the 
looks of it, several of her team was missing.
    Tarantulas did as he was told and afterward they ran a sweep of the ship. 
Inferno was missing and Rampage was injured. Megatron had escaped with the 
Maximals......things were getting worse.
    (Terrorsaur, if your going with Megatron then ignore the sealed doors and 
such and just go)

    The pod slammed into the earth with a crack like thunder. Hell Beast and 
Gremlin then brought the computers back online and prepared to venture 
outside and back to the ship....whatever condition it was in.
    "Ah, being in command shall be good. Now all we have to do is find it." 
Hell Beast siad as he opened the hatch and stepped outside. He was back home 
agian.
